greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Number of partitions of n into distinct squarefree divisors of n.
link: Reinhard Zumkeller and Alois P. Heinz, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..10000 (5000 terms from Reinhard Zumkeller)
formula: a(n) = [x^n] Product_{d|n, mu(d) != 0} (1 + x^d), where mu() is the Moebius function (A008683). - _Ilya Gutkovskiy_, Jul 26 2017
program: a225245 n = p (a206778_row n) n where
p (k:ks) m = if m < k then 0 else p ks (m - k) + p ks m
results.author: _Reinhard Zumkeller_, May 05 2013
